body_html: I've removed the sequence block op (and related tests), this should simplify the CL and it wasn't immediately clear to me which input format to use if we did have a sequence op (i.e., there are certain advantages to using a list of 2-d tensors rather than a 3-dim tensor w/ time as dim). PTAL.
